name: Frankenstein: Beyond the Time
description: Go on a discovery quest where the task is to solve the greatest mystery of Dr. Frankenstein. The game makes innovative use of Virtual Reality with a hidden object model and crafting simulations combined with the fight against time. Become the time master and carry on Dr. Frankenstein’s legacy!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows™ 7 SP1 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows™ 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
